fr.liglab.adele.icasa.location
Interface Zone

All Superinterfaces:
LocatedObject
public interface Zone
extends LocatedObject

This interface represents a Zone (a rectangular surface) into the iCasa platform. Zones can be embeded, a zone can have several children zones. Each children zone must fit into its parent zone.

Author:
Gabriel Pedraza Ferreira

Method Detail

getId

String getId()
Returns the zone id.

Returns:
zone id.

getLeftTopRelativePosition

Position getLeftTopRelativePosition()
Gets the (x,y) point in the left-top corner of the zone. This point is relative to its parent zone. If there is no parent, this method returns the same point of getLeftTopAbsolutePosition method.

Returns:
the relative (x,y) point in the left-top corner of the zone

getLeftTopAbsolutePosition

Position getLeftTopAbsolutePosition()
Gets the absolute (x,y) point in the left-top corner of the zone.

Returns:
the absolute (x,y) point in the left-top corner of the zone.

getRightBottomRelativePosition

Position getRightBottomRelativePosition()
Gets the (x,y) point in the right-bottom corner of the zone. This point is relative to its parent zone. If there is no parent, this method returns the same point of getRightBottomAbsolutePosition method.

Returns:
Gets the relative (x,y) point in the right-bottom corner of the zone.

getRightBottomAbsolutePosition

Position getRightBottomAbsolutePosition()
Gets the absolute (x,y) point in the right-bottom corner of the zone.

Returns:
the absolute (x,y) point in the right-bottom corner of the zone.

setLeftTopRelativePosition

void setLeftTopRelativePosition(Position leftTopPosition)
                                throws Exception
Sets the relative (x,y) point in the left-top corner of the zone.

Parameters:
leftTopPosition - The new left-top corner of the zone.
Throws:
Exception - When the zone does not fit its parent zone.
